summary: This bastard and I walk through rain, and when we get on the bus he comments "I smell like wet dog" And has the AUDACITY to not...
body:
This bastard and I walk through rain, and when we get on the bus he comments “I smell like wet dog” And has the AUDACITY to not laugh at my Padfoot reference.

Friendship cancelled.

@astroboletos

body:
So,

I need help with a story I’m writing and want to know what you’d want to include or how you’d start it…. it’s going to be a little cross over of Harry Potter and Nordic fiction, where a girl who somehow went to school with the Mauraunders and comes back years later after being in Asgard. She has an old magic that is very rare and is known for protecting royals and she is very sought after so people can bottle it. She’s Harry’s godmother and yeah….. help?

tags: merlin lounging at the back of the wizengamot in comfy muggle clothes (he always trips on robes)
‘just here to observe’ he tells anyone who questions him
but he blinks slow and unmoving like a predator cat at the extremist politicans
he’s both harmless and the most dangerous thing you’ll ever meet
and the contrast freaks people out
its been years since i watched a full episode of merlin what am i doing here
summary: There are a lot of Harry Potter/Merlin crossovers, but not many that scratch that deep desire I have to see Merlin (and a...
body:
There are a lot of Harry Potter/Merlin crossovers, but not many that scratch that deep desire I have to see Merlin (and a reincarnated Arthur) properly interacting with the wizarding world.

I need Merlin swanning into the wizengamot and calmly dressing down the stuffy purebloods. People always get so flustered when they see him, it’s hilarious. And really, he’s Merlin. They can’t be seen disagreeing with him publicly, so even if they try argue a counterpoint, most politicians fold like wet paper towel under his stare.

I need Merlin lounging in the Minister’s office while Arthur tears strips off the Minister who clearly has no idea how to be a leader, who does he think he is. (Everyone keeps speculating about what Arthur is going to do now that he’s back, and even Arthur isn’t too sure yet. Every time someone asks Merlin he just gets this look on his face, amused and nostalgic and menacing all at once.)

I need Merlin and Dumbledore to have tea and cake together on a regular basis. They have a lot in common (lying and being tormented by the greater good and working uphill to help those who don’t want your help), even if they don’t always agree. Their friendship works best when they agree not to meddle in each other’s affairs and instead talk at length about muggle sweets and mutual friends.

Just - Merlin being the ancient being that he is, approachable and yet infinitely intimidating, enjoying having Arthur by his side and casually flipping the wizarding world on its head, because he’s lived for centuries, but even he knows the wizarding world is stuck in its old ways and needs a good kick up the backside to get started again.

blog.name: hyperionnebulae
blog.title: Raccoons That Like Lightbulbs
blog.description:
I'm Kes and this is my mainblog. 
@prrtnrr drew my icon

summary:
@drawing-cookie 
My brain woke me up at 5am to be like
What comes first the patronus or the animagus?
We know that James...
body:
@drawing-cookie

My brain woke me up at 5am to be like

What comes first the patronus or the animagus?

We know that James Potter’s patronus and animagus forms are both a stag. And we know that both things are supposed to be high level magic. In fact, becoming an animagus is supposedly incredibly dangerous.

So like

Do they have to be the same thing?

Do we know of a case where they are different?

Could the reason that becoming an animagus is so hard is because it has to be the same as your patronus and your patronus is often not a generic animal type?

How many people were just like “I want to shape change into a lion” or “I want to be a house cat” and it didn’t work because their patronus was like a Scottish fold or a Bengal tiger or something else completely like a pangolin?!

We only know of 4 animagi in canon right? James, Sirius, Peter, and Minerva.

Could it be that the code to figuring out your only animagus form is to know what the manifestation of your happiest thoughts looks like?

Also I want to know if Remus’ patronus is a wolf/werewolf because that doesn’t seem like a happy thought? Edit: Google says that it is indeed an ordinary wolf (apparently never revealed in the books though just on Pottermore).

Further notes: Google says Sirius’ patronus is a dog. Minerva’s is a cat.

Hm we also know that patronus’ can change for who you love. Two cases known: Sevs is a doe supposedly because of Lily and Tonk’s chages to be a wolf when she falls for Remus.

So like

Is that normal? Does that mean like you could have several patronus forms over your life time? Could this further made becoming an animagus dangerous?

Also, we don’t know Peter’s because Rowling has said that the only death eater who can conjure a patronus is Snape. Supposedly because they don’t have happy thoughts anymore??? Maybe?

Can’t they still like be effected by dementors tho? Like Bellatrix was in Azkaban for a long time… Like??? Seems like a useful skill.

Anyways, 5am patronus/animagus thoughts.

blog.description: Criminal Minds | Sims | Pokemon | Harry Potter | HPHM MC: María Allen; Ravenclaw. Rowan Khanna and Bill Weasley as best friends; Charlie Weasley and Barnaby Lee as crush.

title: My MC’s family
body:
The family of the series Dog with a blog, without the little girl and without the dog, could be the family of my MC. It’s almost perfect.

G Hannelius as Maria Allen (my MC)

Blake Michael as Jacob Allen

Beth Littleford as Miss Allen

Regan Burns as Mister Allen

blog.name: istartedbelievinginitmyself
blog.title: I started believing in it myself
blog.description: Absolutely obsessed with Harry Potter and the cursed child. Big theatre and musical fan! Loves Harry Potter, Snape, Kinky Boots and more! , pro Snape, pro cursed child, pro dumbledore, pro fantastic beast, anti character hate in general, pro JK Rowling:D

tags: but they werent about Albus house
why make Harry look like he hates Slytherin
did they even read the full script?
body:
Pottermore

https://www.pottermore.com/features/celebrating-albus-potter-and-scorpius-malfoy-the-next-generation-of-slytherin

Celebrating Albus Potter and Scorpius Malfoy: the next generation of Slytherin - Pottermore

Tell me if I‘m wrong, but there is an entire AU in which Albus isn’t in Slytherin to prove that their problems still exist and that his house doesn’t matter. It’s in the script, literally, that their problems weren’t about Albus being in Slytherin. Harry is in no Part of the play prejudiced against Slytherin house and where in the play did Albus show him Hogwarts houses weren’t labels? Did we read the same script???

I appreciate a cursed child article on Pottermore especially one about Albus‘ and Scorpius‘ friendship, but this really threw me off.

Did I read it wrong? Or did they just skip an entire section of the play…

reblog.comment:
Pottermore

It’s in the script, literally, that their problems weren’t about Albus being in Slytherin. https://www.pottermore.com/features/celebrating-albus-potter-and-scorpius-malfoy-the-next-generation-of-slytherin

Celebrating Albus Potter and Scorpius Malfoy: the next generation of Slytherin - Pottermore

Tell me if I‘m wrong, but there is an entire AU in which Albus isn’t in Slytherin to prove that their problems still exist and that his house doesn’t matter. It’s in the script, literally, that their problems weren’t about Albus being in Slytherin. Harry is in no Part of the play prejudiced against Slytherin house and where in the play did Albus show him Hogwarts houses weren’t labels? Did we read the same script???

I appreciate a cursed child article on Pottermore especially one about Albus‘ and Scorpius‘ friendship, but this really threw me off.

Did I read it wrong? Or did they just skip an entire section of the play…
trail.content:
Pottermore

https://www.pottermore.com/features/celebrating-albus-potter-and-scorpius-malfoy-the-next-generation-of-slytherin

Celebrating Albus Potter and Scorpius Malfoy: the next generation of Slytherin - Pottermore

Tell me if I‘m wrong, but there is an entire AU in which Albus isn’t in Slytherin to prove that their problems still exist and that his house doesn’t matter. It’s in the script, literally, that their problems weren’t about Albus being in Slytherin. Harry is in no Part of the play prejudiced against Slytherin house and where in the play did Albus show him Hogwarts houses weren’t labels? Did we read the same script???

I appreciate a cursed child article on Pottermore especially one about Albus‘ and Scorpius‘ friendship, but this really threw me off.

Did I read it wrong? Or did they just skip an entire section of the play…

summary:
Draco: *dramatic sigh*
Ron: What's wrong with him?
Harry: He says he wants to die
Ron: Shouldn't you been alarmed by...
body:
Draco: *dramatic sigh*
Ron: What's wrong with him?
Harry: He says he wants to die
Ron: Shouldn't you been alarmed by that!?
Draco: *DRAMATIC SIGH*
Harry: He wants to die because Teddy ate the last chocolate biscuit that he was saving for a hard day
Ron: Oh well

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry:
dialogue.phrase: He says he wants to die

dialogue.name: Ron
dialogue.label: Ron:
dialogue.phrase: Shouldn't you been alarmed by that!?

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry:
dialogue.phrase: He wants to die because Teddy ate the last chocolate biscuit that he was saving for a hard day

blog.name: ao3feed-tomarrymort
blog.title: Tomarrymort On AO3
blog.description: An automated feed for the Tom/Harry and Voldemort/Harry AO3 tags. Not a fic recs blog.

title: Taking Charge
description:
by A_Perverted_Romance_Addict

Cedric’s death marked Harry. It made him think. Really think. About life. About death. What it means to live and what is important in life. His priorities change. His perception of the world and people within it changes.

As he evaluates his life until now, he comes to the realisation that his life has never been his own and that he was never truly alive. Determined to change that, he makes a decision; he is going to take his life into his own hands. He is going to be the only one in charge of himself and his happiness. Because he wanted and deserved to be happy. He wanted and deserved to live without people meddling and trying to control him, without trying to hurt him.

He was aware people would be confused. They will have questions. Some will support him, some will absolutely resent him. He still wasn’t sure who will fall into which category, but he honestly didn’t give a damn about it, because almost nobody seemed to give a damn about him either.

Words: 2589, Chapters: 1/20, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of In Charge

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Underage
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Tom Riddle | Voldemort
  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Tom Riddle, Harry Potter/Tom Riddle | Voldemort
  • Additional Tags: Chill Harry Potter, Laid-back Harry Potter, Voldemort infiltrates Hogwarts as a Student, Romance, Humor, Harry confuses the living shit out of Voldemort, Book 5: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, No Sex, Some kissing

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Lily Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

summary: do you remember that really long fanfic about how harry james potter got sorted into gryffindor instead of slytherin and saw...
body: do you remember that really long fanfic about how harry james potter got sorted into gryffindor instead of slytherin and saw draco malfoy as his enemy? i mean, it was okay, not the best writing out there but okay.
